rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-001Exxx Notify PS Ops Services SOW Unclear Sends an email notification to PS Ops whenever Recurring Involved field is set to "Not Sure"
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Recurring_Involved__c,"Not Sure")

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-002EFxx New SOW Request - Recurr Sends an email notification whenever a new SOW request is created or the Status of the Services SOW is changed to "Submitted" with Recurring Amount
Rule Code: SOW-003Exxx SOW Completed Notification (Recurring) Sends an email notification whenever a SOW Status is "SOW Completed"
Rule Code: SOW-004xFxx Populate Completion Date when Completed Checkbox is checked Populates the Completion Date field when the Completed checkbox field is checked.
Rule Code: SOW-005xFxx Populate Services SOW Emails Populates the SE Manager, SOW Creator, and CRD Email fields whenever Recurring Involved is set to "Not Sure"
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Recurring_Involved__c,"Not Sure")), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Recurring_Involved__c) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-006EFxx Notify SOW Technical Scoping needed (PS NA North) Sends an email notification when a scoper is assigned.

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-015Exxx Changes requested from requesting employee Sends an email notification whenever a SOW status is "Returned to Requesting Employee for Edits" and recordtype is SOW
Rule Code: SOW-016EFxx Completed Services SOW Update SC-000017 Resets the status of an SOW to "Ready for Review" if an SOW is in status "SOW Completed" and is edited.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "SOW Completed"), Completion_Date__c<DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate), NOT($User.Id="0055000000760CW"), /*Ashish Sharma*/ NOT($User.Id="0052J000008gkfV"), /*Sarah Bakeer*/ NOT($User.Id="0052J000008V2aD"), /*Daniel Giampietro*/ NOT($User.Id="005500000074rL8") /*Heather Curry*/ )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-017Exxx SC-000057 Early Resource Request Assigned Sends an email notification whenever Assigned Resource is changed and its prior value was a blank value.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Assigned_Resource__c), PRIORVALUE(Assigned_Resource__c)=NULL )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-018Exxx SC-000057 Early Resource Request Returned for Edits Sends an email notification to requester when Services Request Status is set to "Returned for Edits"
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Services_Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Services_Request_Status__c, "Returned for Edits") )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-019xFxx Quote Only SOW Status Update Sets SOW status to ''SOW Completed'' whenever Status value is set to "Ready for Review" and Request Type is "Quote only"
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Ready for Review"), ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c, "Quote only") )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-020Exxx SOW Ready to Review Notification SC-000009 Sends an email notification when an SOW is ready to be reviewed.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Ready for Review"), ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c, "SOW document required") )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-021xFxx Populate Date Technical Scoping Assigned Populates Date Technical Scoping Assigned field whenever Technical Scoping Assigned To field is changed from blank value
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Technical_Scoping_Assigned_To__c), PRIORVALUE(Technical_Scoping_Assigned_To__c)=NULL )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-022xFxx Update Opportunity Stage for new SOW Requests Updates the field "Opportunity Stage at Request" field whenever a new SOW is created.
rules.formula: OR( RecordType.Name = "Early Resource Tracking", AND( RecordType.Name = "SOW", ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c, "SOW document required") ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-023xFxx Populate SOW: Completion Date Populates the "Completion Date" with the current date when the Services SOW "Status" field is "SOW Modified"
Rule Code: SOW-024Exxx RFP Reminder Sends an email notification when an incomplete RFP has a due date in 3 days.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Services_Request_Status__c, "Completed")), RecordType.Id = "01250000000caCy", NOT(ISBLANK(Due_Date__c)) )

rules.description: Rule Code: SOW-025Exxx RFP Completed Sends an email notification when an incomplete RFP has been completed.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Services_Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Services_Request_Status__c, "Completed") )
